PAGE.p: Experimental support for SSL VPN was added to OpenConnect in June 2021.

CheckPoint mode is requested by adding --protocol=checkpoint to the command line:
openconnect --protocol=checkpoint snx.example.com
Currently, OpenConnect supports basic username and password, PinPad, KeyFob, Challenge and certificate-based authentication. Mobile Access mode is a WIP.
Data transport over ESP is not yet supported.
Please, do not specify any path part of the server URL. It is not supported.
